title: Reactive support:
description: It is the support that is triggered by a request from a customer.

title: End user support:
description: It is the support that is provided to the end users. The first-level support team provides this support.

title: Application support:
description: It is the support that is provided to the application. The second-level support team provides this support.

title: Development support:
description: It is the support that is provided to the application. The third-level support team provides this support.This support is also known as custom development.

title: Proactive support (continuous)
description: Support is the process of helping customers to solve problems and to get the most out of their products. It includes both reactive and proactive activities.
